ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mob that Wouldn't Mez
ygData.msgSnippet: The only conclusion I could make was that they DOT themselves.  Again - Channelers can cast any spell that any player in the group has memmed - you often see
ygData.messageBody:
"The only conclusion I could make was that they DOT themselves. Again -
Channelers can cast any spell that any player in the group has memmed - you
often see them CH..."

Huh? I don't know about this. I have hunted here quite a bit (100 hours?).
And I have never seen these guys charm. = P. I have charm mem'd here a
lot.

I've never seen a mob smart enough to DoT himself.

Mu

On a side note I have seen a lot of mobs that I couldn't mez after Tash and
I am not a bard expert by any stretch of the word, I play an Enchanter, so I
am not sure of the name of the spell you use says something about "xxxxx
hair stands on end". This spell REALLY helps alot. I would have the bard
use this first before the argo change to tashania , why not he was meleeing
anyways, and I could slow without having to cast Tashania and get myself
beat down. Then I could tashania after it was slowed.



-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2001 2:03 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Mob that Wouldn't Mez


I was in The Courtyard Area of The Hole last night and twice we fought
Elemental Channelers would couldn't be mezzed. Both a 52 Enchanter and
myself (54 Bard) couldn't get our Mez's to stick.

Channelers can cast spells that group members have; and our Druid (a VERY
good player) insisted she didn't DOT him by mistake. The Wizard in the
group is new to my guild and I haven't played with him very much - but there
was no evidence that he was a sloppy player and not a single instance all
not (otherwise) of mis-targetted mobs.

I did notice that when I was finally able to get the Mez to stick - that
there was a significant amount of damage on the mob.

The only conclusion I could make was that they DOT themselves. Again -
Channelers can cast any spell that any player in the group has memmed - you
often see them CH...

Slyde
